messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] how hot is it  where º   Uº R???
messages.msgSnippet: Pris, I am out of practice on the rain jig thing, but I ll see what I can do! Sandy
messages.messageBody:
Pris,
I am out of practice on the rain jig thing, but I'll see what I can do!

Sandy

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] how hot is it  where º   Uº R???
messages.msgSnippet: We relocated back to Maryland from Texas just a little over a year ago.  We left in June of 1999 and there were water restrictions at that time - like not
messages.messageBody:
We relocated back to Maryland from Texas just a little over a year ago. We
left in June of 1999 and there were water restrictions at that time - like
not washing your car - but nothing like I have seen on the news lately. Back
here in Maryland though, it seems we can;t get out from under the clouds. I
know you need rain and if I could send it I would. I feel water logged!

Sandy
